step1.title: Let's set up your domain
step1.text: Enter the custom domain you wish to add.

errors.invalidFormat: This is not a valid domain. Note: do NOT add 'http' or 'www' when entering your domain.
errors.usedDomain: This domain is already in use

step2.title: Visit your DNS Manager

text1.second: or whomever your domain provider is and access the
text1.third: where you can add MX and Text records.

step2.text2: Delete any existing MX records before proceeding.

step2_2.title: Add Records for Criptext
step2_2.text: Add the following records in your DNS Manager. This will verify your domain ownership and configure Criptext email settings.

note.text: If you see the field TTL (time to live), enter 3600 seconds (1hour). Your host may not include a field called ‚ÄúName‚Äù, ‚ÄúHost‚Äù, or ‚ÄúAlias‚Äù.

error1.title: MX records don‚Äôt match
error1.text: Go back and verify that you've added the right information into your

error2.title: DNS records for this domain were not found
error2.text_1: is listed as your domain, make sure this is right; otherwise correct the domain on your Company Profile.
error2.text_2: Also check that the DNS records on your domain are not empty; otherwise go back and add them from the previous steps.

error3.title: Something Went Wrong
error3.text: Try again in a couple of minutes.

parragraphs.password: Your password has changed remotely and you must confirm your new password.
parragraphs.device: the device will log out and
parragraphs.data: all local data will be erased

paragraphs.header: Enter your password then your new password and confirm it

paragraph.note_text: Changing your recovery email will disable two-factor authentication

errors.criptext_email_not_confirmed: This address has no verified recovery email.
errors.email_max_reached: This address has already been used {0} times.
errors.current_email: This is the current recovery email

paragraphs.header: WARNING: Deleting your account will erase all mailbox and account data on all devices as well as disable your username from being used in the future.

delete_alias.title: Delete Alias
delete_alias.description: If you delete this Alias your emails will remain intact, but you will no longer be able to send or receive emails under that address.
delete_alias.question: Are you sure you want to delete {0}?

errors.title: Oops...
errors.cannot: Aliases ending in @{0} cannot be deleted within 15 days from the day they were created.

delete_custom_domain.title: Remove your domain
delete_custom_domain.description: Are you sure you want to delete your domain? Your mails will not disapear, but aliases with this domain will be deleted.

api_version.title: App Out of Date
api_version.description: Your App is to old. Please update it so you keep enjoying Criptext!

once.title: Auto Backup
once.description: Auto Backup ensures that your data is never lost.

last.title: Warning ‚ö†Ô∏è
last.description: Your emails are exclusively kept on your device, not Criptext servers. This means that if you delete the app or lose your device you will lose all your emails.

export_backup.title: Export Backup File
export_backup.description: If you lose/forget this passphrase you won't be able to restore this backup in the future

note.content: For your security we sugest you chose to encrypt the backup file.

paragraphs.header: Are you sure you want to logout?
Your entire mailbox data will be erased and replaced with the mailbox data from your other device.
paragraphs.question: Are you sure you want to continue?

manual_sync_device_authentication.title: Device Authentication
manual_sync_device_authentication.message: Check and approve this sign in from your existing Criptext devices

manual_sync_device_rejected.title: Authentication Rejected
manual_sync_device_rejected.message: Your request to access this account was rejected by a verified device

warning.text: Multiple rejections could lead your device to be blacklisted from Criptext

keepWaiting.title: Sync taking longer than usual
keepWaiting.message: Would you like to continue waiting?

permanently_delete.title: Warning!
permanently_delete.message: This elements will be permanently deleted and you will not be able to recover them. Are you sure?

paragraphs.header: Removing access will automatically sign you out of your account on this device.

remove_label.title: Remove Label
remove_label.message: Are you sure you want to permanently remove label {0}

restore_backup_request.title: Restore Backup
restore_backup_request.paragraph: Restore your emails from a local backup. This can be done later from Settings>Account>Restore Backup

restore_backup_invalid_file.title: Invalid File
restore_backup_invalid_file.paragraph: The selected file is either corrupted or belongs to another email account

new_pin.title: New Encryption PIN
new_pin.description: A PIN is the secure way to access your encrypted email

recovery_key.title: Your new recovery key
recovery_key.description: If you forget your PIN, this code will help you to get back in. Save it in a place you will remember

checkbox.title: Don't require PIN on startup
checkbox.description: Your PIN will be saved in your keychain so you don't have to enter it every time you start Criptext.

set_reply_to.title: Set Reply To Email
set_reply_to.paragraph: When someone replies to one of your emails, they will reply to the address set here.

note.content: Auto backups are not password protected

suspended_account.title: You are suspended
suspended_account.paragraph: This account has been temporarily suspended by your administrator. Please contact your company administrator for more information.

two_fa.title: 2FA Enabled!
two_fa.paragraph: Next time you sign into your account on another device you'll have to enter your password and then validate the sign in from an existing device.

edit_label.title: Edit Label
edit_label.message: Enter the new name for your label

alias.title: Enjoy Aliases
alias.message: With Aliases you can manage multiple addresses in one inbox

domains.title: Enjoy Custom Domains
domains.message: Add custom email addresses with a Domain that you already own like you@company.com

upgrade_plus.message: Help us bring more awesome features to all, by joining Plus.

aliases.title: Aliases
aliases.description: Create a secondary address for your existing inbox.

custom_domains.title: Custom Domains
custom_domains.description: Send emails from a personal domain that you own.

auto.label: Auto Backup
auto.description: Note: Auto backups are not password protected
auto.no_backup: A Backup has not being created yet

manual.label: Mailbox Backup
manual.description: Generate a backup of your inbox that can be exported to external drives

progress.backing_up_mailbox: Exporting backup file. This can take a few minutes...

restore_backup.label: Restore Backup
restore_backup.description: Easily restore your mailbox from a local backup file.

criptext_libraries.label: Criptext Libraries
criptext_libraries.description: See some of the ingredients that have made Criptext possible

settings.encrypt_to_externals_description: If enabled, when sending an email you will be asked for a password to encrypt the email for non-criptext recipient. If disable, criptext addresses will receive an encrypted email while others won't.

mailbox_sync.label: Request Mailbox Sync
mailbox_sync.description: Lets you transfer your entire mailbox from another device into this one
mailbox_sync.tooltip: You must have at least one additional device to sync

notification_preview.label: Show Notification Preview
notification_preview.description: Preview email content in desktop notification

password.label: Password
password.description: Choose a strong password, don‚Äôt reuse it

privacy_policy.label: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.description: See our commitment to protecting your privacy

settings.read_receipts_description: If you turn off read receipts, you won't be able to see read receipts from other people

recovery_email.label: Recovery Email
recovery_email.description: This is in case you forget your password and need to reset it

settings.reply_to_not_set: When someone replies to one of your emails, they will reply to the address set here.

security_pin.label: Database Encryption PIN
security_pin.description: This disables other apps from accessing Criptext files

terms_of_service.label: Terms of service
terms_of_service.description: Our lawyers really emphasized this be here ;)

settings.two_factor_not_available_text: To enable Two-Factor Authentication you must set and verify a recovery email

buttonCompose.text: Start by sending a new email

emailRead.text: Looks like this email was read!

activityFeed.text: See which emails have been read and by whom

secureMessage.text: Lock icon means this email is encrypted

step_1.title: Welcome!
step_1.description: Your secure email experience starts now. Be ready for privacy without compromise.

step_2.title: Strong Privacy
step_2.description: Criptext doesn't collect email data. Your emails are only stored on your device.

step_3.title: The power is yours
step_3.description: You create information, we believe you have a right to own it.
